notices.name: We're investigating reports of build failures on a subset of builder hosts

updates.message: The affected build node has been cycled. A critical daemon on the node crashed and did not correctly update the nodes healthcheck. Any work landing on that node was thus instantly failing. We're taking measures to fix the healthcheck to ensure only healthy build nodes take on work.
updates.messageHtml: The affected build node has been cycled. A critical daemon on the node crashed and did not correctly update the nodes healthcheck. Any work landing on that node was thus instantly failing. We're taking measures to fix the healthcheck to ensure only healthy build nodes take on work.

updates.message: We've identified the affected builder instance and are cycling it out.
updates.messageHtml: We've identified the affected builder instance and are cycling it out.

updates.message: We're investigating reports of build failures on a subset of builder hosts
updates.messageHtml: We're investigating reports of build failures on a subset of builder hosts

notices.name: A percentage of users are seeing an issue with builds during snapshot creation

updates.message: We've pushed a fix and builds are going through fine
updates.messageHtml: We've pushed a fix and builds are going through fine

updates.message: A percentage of users are seeing an issue with builds during snapshot creation
